channel.title: [PI] Ubuntu VPS Help
channel.description:
I'm trying to run my server on my vps and I always get this error. Someone please help. [CODE] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: server/Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. [/CODE]
Run.sh file: [CODE] #!/bin/bash java -Xmx1024m -cp bin:deps\poi.jar:deps\mysql.jar:deps\mina.jar:deps\slf4j.jar:deps\slf4j-nop.jar:deps\jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar server.Server [/CODE]
Please please please help :/

item.title: [PI] Ubuntu VPS Help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You must recompile the source code, the server you’re running was compiled with a lower Java version such as Java 6, which isn’t compatible with Java 7.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Ubuntu VPS Help
item.dc:creator: @m4x_pwng3 m4x pwng3
item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:

Jmood:

The VM version you’re using isn’t compatible with the server you’re trying to run. You will need to upgrade your Java to the newest one which is Java 7.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.InternalError: Can't connect to X11 window server using ':0.0' as the value of the DISPLAY variable. at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.initDisplay(Native Method) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.access$200(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:65) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment$1.run(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:110) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.<clinit>(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:74) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:186) at java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.createGE(GraphicsEnvironment.java:102) at java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment(GraphicsEnvironment.java:81) at java.awt.Window.initGC(Window.java:466) at java.awt.Window.init(Window.java:486) at java.awt.Window.<init>(Window.java:533) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:420) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:385) at javax.swing.JFrame.<init>(JFrame.java:180) at server.util.ControlPanel.<init>(ControlPanel.java:20) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:61)

ive done export DISPLAY=0.0

this is the error I’m getting. What should I do?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Ubuntu VPS Help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The VM version you’re using isn’t compatible with the server you’re trying to run. You will need to upgrade your Java to the newest one which is Java 7.

Read full topic

I’m trying to run my server on my vps and I always get this error. Someone please help.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: server/Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server.
